displayName.text: Consulate General of Saudi Arabia in New York

formattedAddress: 866 2nd Ave 5th floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 866 2nd Ave 5th floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Called 3 times right now and can't reach anyone (rings so many times then get hung up). It's 3:30-3:40pm. Online says open until 4pm. Please either ensure that the employees are not hanging up or update the timing so those calling can know what time the office is open. Shukran.

text.text: Called 3 times right now and can't reach anyone (rings so many times then get hung up). It's 3:30-3:40pm. Online says open until 4pm. Please either ensure that the employees are not hanging up or update the timing so those calling can know what time the office is open. Shukran.

originalText.text: Staff are ignorant of their own kingdom. I had to wait behind a nice man trying to help his minor daughter. He was given the run-around and told to go make photocopies down the street. Saudi Arabia is one of the richest kingdoms on the planet- that employee should have made the copies his damn self using consulate equipment!

text.text: Staff are ignorant of their own kingdom. I had to wait behind a nice man trying to help his minor daughter. He was given the run-around and told to go make photocopies down the street. Saudi Arabia is one of the richest kingdoms on the planet- that employee should have made the copies his damn self using consulate equipment!

originalText.text:
YOU WONT BELIEVE THIS LOL.

1) I called to ask for what will be required for a Saudi Visa for a green card holder, and they said they don't know and hung up.
2) I went to ask about more information and they said I can email "them" and when I asked for the email address the staff told me to Google it lmao.
3) I show up in person with all the documents and they told me to bring other documents I needed but apparently they never knew what documents I need to bring to begin with??

These people and even those running Saudi will suffer, they will not be at peace when they face Allah.

If this was something for Americans to use for help, Americans wouldve recked them, but U.S. passport holders wont need to set foot in this trash building.

3) I show up in person with all the documents and they told me to bring other documents I needed but apparently they never knew what documents I need to bring to begin with??

These people and even those running Saudi will suffer, they will not be at peace when they face Allah.

If this was something for Americans to use for help, Americans wouldve recked them, but U.S. passport holders wont need to set foot in this trash building.

originalText.text: I came in for a civil matter and Mr. Bilal Al-Ansari handled my case with a high degree of diligence, professionalism, and dedication that made the whole experience an absolute delight.

text.text: I came in for a civil matter and Mr. Bilal Al-Ansari handled my case with a high degree of diligence, professionalism, and dedication that made the whole experience an absolute delight.

originalText.text: If you have all the required documents, the process is smooth at the consulate. The people are cooperative as well. I did not have any negative experience over there
